Posts.Content: Oct 8, 2018 03:51PM GretchenS wrote: The diagnosis is, low grade B cell non Hodgkin lymphoma. We are seeing an oncologist tomorrow to get a better idea of what will come next.
Posts.Title: Intramammery lymph node GretchenS djmammo

Posts.Content: GretchenS wrote: I had my first 3D mammogram this year and have had to undergo an ultra sound and a core needle biopsy for an enlarged intramammery lymph node. There is very little information on this. I was told by the radiologist that I would be notified with in 48 hours. I was called by my doctor's office on Friday, 72 hours later and told I needed to schedule an appointment for Monday to see the my doctor to go over the results. I was under the impression they would call to give me the results as they did with my mammogram results. I am so nervous and don't know what to expect. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Intramammery lymph node GretchenS djmammo
